name: Candy Store Smartphone Stand
description: Made by hand from 100% recycled skateboards, this stand holds your smartphone at a comfortable viewing angle in either portrait or landscape mode. Each stand is cut to order and measures roughly 2 x 2.5 inches, features a limited color scheme and hand stamped logo. All products are finished with organic linseed oil. Color: Blue, pink, yellow, green, purple. CLICK HERE FOR SIZING INFO Free domestic shipping!

name: Incense Holder - Blue and Yellow
description: These eye-catching incense holders are made from a recycled black label skateboard. Each incense holder is unique and measures 1.5" by 8". Lengths vary slightly due to skateboards being different widths. Color: This listing is only available in blue and yellow with varying graphics. If you have a preference please state it under "Notes to seller" during checkout and we'll do our best to accomodate. WARNING: Please use caution when using this incense holder as it is made of wood and may be flammable if misused. Use common sense and never leave burning incense unattended. Flipwood is not liable for personal damage or injury resulting from misuse of this product. Free domestic shipping!

name: Graphic Key Chain
description:
Made by hand from 100% recycled skateboards, these keychains are roughly 3 inches tall and .75 inches wide with some being as wide as 1". All key chains feature American-made, nickel-plated hardware, hand-stamped logo and organic linseed oil finish.

These keychains are one-of-a-kind and often feature wheel bite, concave twists and even stickers that the riders had on their decks. 

These key chains are made from the portion of the skateboard that holds the trucks, so the graphic is almost always visible no matter how hard the board was used. 

Keychains are picked at random. If you have a preference for the color of wood, design or amount of wear please add a note under "notes to seller" during checkout and we'll do our best to accomodate your request.
